extension.name: dutch47
extension.description: Dutch translation of untranslated strings in CiviCRM 4.7
extension.comments: This module is a workaround for transifex being broken for CiviCRM 4.7. See https://civicrm.stackexchange.com/questions/10108/how-to-fix-translations-in-civicrm-4-7 https://issues.civicrm.org/jira/browse/CRM-17737 https://forum.civicrm.org/index.php?topic=37086.0 https://www.transifex.com/civicrm/civicrm/
